item.title: vRA 8 + NSX-T Blog Series Part 2: vRA 8 Blueprint with On-demand Routed NSX-T Networks
item.author: Autor
item.description: ~ Este post será traducido al español próximamente ~ You can create a vRA 8 blueprint to create an on-demand routed NSX-T network and deploy machines connected to these newly created network. When you tell the blueprint to create an on-demand routed NSX-T network, vRA 8 actually creates a tier-1 gateway that connects to the pre-existing tier-0 gateway. It then creates an on-demand network and attaches it to the tier-1 gateway that it has created.
